body:
I believe that I once stumbled across a discussion about the tip in the ["Building your own compiler" section of the getting started docs](http://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/getting_started.html#build-your-own-compiler).

My memory is that some people thought it would work and others didn't but that not many people actually follow the tip.

I can not find the discussion.  I *think* it was an Issue, but it might have been in the Google group.

Anyone remember?
title: Help finding old discussion re: the tip under getting_started.html#build-your-own-compiler
